user_query: love me anymore [Music] huh get the hell out of here [Music] right all right the matter with you all right defendant must not commit or attempt to commit any further crime please let me just sign the [ __ ] thing already you it wasn't even a choice for the next 6 hours I came up with a list friends enemies business associates anybody who'd ever known me or taken so much as a stock tip Jordan do you know how good it is to have you back in this office do you ever ever get back to you about that um about that uh that account was supposed to kick back four five mil was it you know I was [ __ ] up Jordan you know so I I don't remember yeah well you know if he calls you you make sure and contact me okay yeah of of course yeah of course yeah no suppose you're going to eat that last piece of yellowtail bud so what else is uh how's Naomi and everything you know you know how it is Mr Jordan Mr Jordan you got a visitor I need you to get dressed the [ __ ] going on you're going to jail [Music] FBI sit down put your hands they can be seen and shut [Music] up God bless and Heaven hold the [Music] fuck Mr Belfort has helped the government win convictions of over two dozen serious offenders and helped them recover millions of dollars to be made available for restitution to their victims the sentence of the Court shall be 36 months in federal prison please remand the defendant [Music] love has left and gone away I'm not ashamed to admit it we arrived to prison I was absolutely terrified see

entities.entity_description: 조던 벨포트는 법정에서 재판을 받고 FBI에 체포되어 연방 교도소에 36개월 형을 선고받는 인물이다. 정부에 협조하여 20명 이상의 범죄자 유죄 판결과 수백만 달러 회수에 도움을 주었다
나오미는 조던 벨포트와 관계가 있는 인물로, 다른 캐릭터가 그녀의 안부를 묻는다
FBI는 조던 벨포트를 체포하고 구금하는 연방 수사 기관이다
월스트리트의 늑대는 조던 벨포트의 범죄와 체포, 재판 과정을 다루는 영화이다

relationships.relationship_description: 조던 벨포트와 나오미는 관계가 있으며 다른 인물이 그녀에 대해 묻는다

THE WOLF OF WALL STREET.description: THE WOLF OF WALL STREET -> THE WOLF OF WALL STREET
